name: Westside Max Effort Upper
notes: Maximum effort push workout. To Improve strength

name: 12 Week Shred - Upperbody Power 1
notes: Upper body power workout from 12-week shred 5-day program. High volume and moderate intensity to improve strength and get people comfortable lifting. 4-6 reps for power movements, 8-12 for volume, 90 sec rest for accessories. Rest 48 hours between training same muscle groups. Program consists of 5 training days per week.

name: 12 Week Shred - Legs 1
notes: Legs workout from 12-week shred 5-day program focusing on quads, hamstrings and calves. Includes 30 mins LISS cardio. 8-12 reps for volume, 12-15 for accessories, 90 sec rest between exercises.

name: 12 Week Shred - Chest/Shoulders/Triceps
notes: Push workout from 12-week shred 5-day program targeting chest, shoulders and triceps. 8-12 reps for volume, 90 sec rest between exercises.

name: 12 Week Shred - Back/Biceps/Abs
notes: Pull workout from 12-week shred 5-day program targeting back, biceps and core. Core exercises replace hanging leg raises and machine crunches. 8-12 reps for volume, 90 sec rest between exercises.

name: 12 Week Shred - Lower Body Power
notes: Lower body power workout from 12-week shred 5-day program with heavy compounds. Includes 30 mins LISS cardio. 4-6 reps for power movements, 3 min rest for heavy compounds, 90 sec for accessories.

name: 3 Day Total Body A

notes: 3-day program workout A. Cycle A→B→C→A continuously. 3 training days, 4 rest days per week. Focus on compound movements with moderate volume. Leave 48 hours between training same muscle groups. 2-5 min rest compounds, 1-2 min isolation. Aim RPE 9 on compounds. Follow for 6-8 months minimum.

name: Buendia Bulk - Chest

exercises.notes: Pyramid up to heavy sets, then drop for volume. Perfect form priority. 3 second negatives on final set.
Drop-set on final set down 20lbs for 10 more reps
Cable fly ladders: 5 low + 5 mid + 5 high, repeat 3x per set
Hammer strength incline: 5 full + 5 partial + 5 full + 5 partial
FST-7 protocol: 7 sets with 20 second rest

notes: Chest day from Buendia Bulk program. Focus on perfect form over ego lifting. Use pyramid training and advanced techniques like FST-7 and ladders for maximum muscle stimulation.

name: Buendia Bulk - Back

exercises.notes: Drop-set on final set down 30lbs for 10 more reps
Hold peak contraction 1 second. Final set: 5 slow reps + 10 regular
Reverse grip lat pulldown. Drive elbows to sides, chest up
Bent over rows. Final set lighter weight with slow negatives
Straight leg deadlifts. Final set drop-set for 10 more reps
FST-7 rope straight arm pulldowns. 20 second rest between sets

notes: Back day from Buendia Bulk program. Focus on lat stretch and peak contractions. Maintain perfect posture throughout all movements.

name: Buendia Bulk - Shoulders

exercises.notes: Final set add 5 partial reps at top of movement
Drop-set ladder: 20lb×10, 25lb×10, 30lb×10, 35lb×10 partials
Barbell front raise variation
Standing barbell overhead press. Slight knee bend, core tight
Barbell upright row. Wide grip to target rear delts. Final set drop-set
12 full reps + 5 partial reps each set. Use chest fly machine facing backwards

notes: Shoulders day from Buendia Bulk program. Focus on all three deltoid heads with progressive overload and advanced techniques.

name: Buendia Bulk - Arms

exercises.notes: Superset with close grip bench press
Close grip bench press. Hands shoulder-width apart
Single arm spider curl. Superset with overhead tricep extension
Overhead dumbbell tricep extension
Final set: 5 reps to 5 partials. Superset with pushdowns
Straight bar pushdown. Final set: 5 reps to 5 partials
Cable rope hammer curl. Final set: 5 reps to 5 partials
Cable rope overhead extension. Final set: 5 reps to 5 partials
EZ bar reverse grip curl. Superset with bar dips
Bar dips for triceps focus

notes: Arms day from Buendia Bulk program. Superset format with bicep and tricep exercises. Focus on time under tension and mind-muscle connection.

name: High Intensity - Push Day 1

exercises.notes: Slight decline with 25lb plate prop. Pyramid to heavy set, then drop 30% for failure set. RPE 10-11
Slight incline. Explosive drive up, perfect form to failure. RPE 10
Cluster set: failure, 20sec rest, repeat 4x (8,5,4,3 reps). RPE 11
Cable flye. 15 second stretch hold on 10th rep. RPE 11
Seated with belt. Perfect form to failure. RPE 10
Triple drop set: 8-10 reps each drop. RPE 10
Rear delt burnout sets. RPE 9-10
Assisted dip or rope pushdown. 90 second breaks. RPE 10
Kettlebell or dumbbell lying extensions. Better stretch. RPE 10

notes: High intensity push day with advanced techniques. Focus on RPE 10-11 training with cluster sets, drop sets, and stretch emphasis. Stop 1-2 inches from chest on presses for shoulder health.

name: High Intensity - Leg Day

exercises.notes: 8 hard reps + 10 slow partials + 30 second iso-hold. RPE 12
Explosive drive up. Perfect form. 8th rep brutally hard. RPE 10
Straight sets to failure. RPE 10
Death set: 3 sec down, pause halfway up 3 sec, 90 seconds each leg. RPE 11
Banded stiff leg. 3 sec down, 1 sec stretch, up 4/5 way. RPE 10
10 reps + 10 partials + 10 sec stretch. Do tibia raises between all sets. RPE 9-10

notes: High intensity leg day with advanced techniques. Focus on stretch position training and brutal intensity. Includes partials, iso-holds, and death sets.

name: High Intensity - Pull Day (Pump)

exercises.notes: Banded chins to failure. Fast lat pump. RPE 10
Supinated grip, drive elbows straight down. RPE 10
Chest supported, pronated grip. Full stretch. RPE 10
Hyperextensions bodyweight only. RPE 10
8 reps + 6 partials from top. RPE 11
Reverse curls EZ bar. 10 partials when can't get past 90°. RPE 11
Rope crunches to complete failure. RPE 10

notes: Pump-focused pull day with 60-second rest periods. Goal is massive pumps and blood flow. Advanced techniques with partials and failure training.

name: High Intensity - Push Day (Pump)

exercises.notes: Slight incline. No lockout, keep tension on pecs. 60 second breaks. RPE 10
Hex press. Flex hard at lockout. RPE 10
Stretch pushups on plates or handles. Feet elevated if too easy. RPE 10
Side lateral partials. Superset with seated press. RPE 10
Seated. No lockout, pumping motion. Superset with laterals. RPE 10
Dual handle pushdown. Spongy grips if available. RPE 10
Kettlebell lying extensions for better stretch. RPE 10

notes: Pump-focused push day with supersets and 60-second breaks. Focus on blood flow and muscle stretch. No lockouts to maintain tension.

name: Bodybuilding System - Upper Strength

exercises.notes: 45° incline. 1 second pause at bottom maintaining pec tension. RPE 7-8
Cable crossover ladder: low/mid/high positions. RPE 8
1.5x shoulder width grip. 2-3 second negative. Feel lats pulling apart
High cable lateral raise. Focus on squeezing lateral delt
Pendlay deficit row. Big stretch, touch stomach/chest each rep
Overhead cable triceps extension. 0.5-1 sec pause in stretch
Bayesian cable curl variation. Address imbalances if present

notes: Upper body strength focus from Bodybuilding Transformation System. RPE-based progression with advanced techniques. Focus on form and controlled negatives.

name: Bodybuilding System - Lower Strength

exercises.notes: Lying leg curl. Maximum stretch at bottom. Prevent butt from popping up
Feet forward 3-6 inches for upright squat. More quad focus
Stop 75% to lockout. Stay in bottom 3/4 ROM for hamstring tension
Seat back far as possible. 2-3 second negative. Feel quads pulling apart
1-2 second pause at bottom. Roll ankle back and forth on balls of feet
Core strengthening exercise. Hold proper plank position

notes: Lower body strength focus with controlled negatives and specialized techniques for maximum muscle development.

name: Bodybuilding System - Push Hypertrophy

exercises.notes: Comfortable arch, quick pause on chest, explode up each rep. RPE 7-8
Seated. Elbows break 90°. Mind-muscle connection with delts
Bottom-half DB flyes. Deep stretch in pecs at bottom of each rep
High-cable lateral raise. Focus on squeezing lateral delt to move weight
EZ-bar skull crusher. 0.5-1 second pause in stretched position
Cable triceps kickback. Shoulder positioned back behind torso in squeeze
Core strengthening exercise. Hold proper plank position

notes: Push day hypertrophy focus with partial ROM techniques and stretch-focused movements for maximum pump.

name: Bodybuilding System - Pull Hypertrophy

exercises.notes: Neutral-grip lat pulldown. Handle out in front like pullover/pulldown cross
Chest-supported machine row. 45° elbows, squeeze shoulder blades hard
1-arm 45° cable rear delt flye. 1-2 second pause in squeeze
Machine shrug. Brief pause top and bottom. Pull shoulders up to ears
EZ-bar cable curl. Lowest position, constant tension, slow controlled reps
Machine preacher curl. Smooth controlled reps, mind-muscle connection

notes: Pull day hypertrophy with pause techniques and constant tension methods for maximum lat and arm development.

name: Bodybuilding System - Legs Hypertrophy

exercises.notes: Controlled negative, don't free fall. Explode on positive. RPE 7-8
Seated leg curl. Lean forward over machine for maximum hamstring stretch
Medium strides. Minimize contribution from back leg
Hip extension exercise. Focus on squeezing glutes at top
Standing calf raise. 1-2 second pause at bottom. Roll ankle back and forth

notes: Legs hypertrophy day focused on controlled movements and maximum stretch positions for leg development.
